Summary: 6 Orange Orbs in V shape Formation - South to NE travel- joined by 7th
divs: sighting detailsat 12:15 a.m. on january 1, 2010, the family was watching the fireworks on the west side of the house minutes after the new year countdown. we turned to watch the blue moon on the east side of the house, when suddenly, we saw six orange\red orbs flying across the sky in "v" formation. initially believing they were fireworks, we waited for them to explode, dissolve or fall. none of these happened. instead, they kept flying in a controlled "v" formation from a south to ne direction for approximately two minutes. we saw them entering into light clouds, all disappearing. we were expecting them to reappear immediately in the next cloud opening. that never happened. even my daughter, who is very skeptical, was in shock and could not deny what we all saw.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Boynton Beach
There were no other sightings in Boynton Beach on or around January 1st 2010
